author: abm_admin
title: Pharmaceutical Raw Materials
text:
Get today's life science headlines and news - Sign up now! 
EMD Millipore, the Life Science business of Merck KGaA of Darmstadt, Germany, introduced enhancements to its industry-leading EMPROVE portfolio of pharmaceutical raw materials. The expanded documentation and regulatory information facilitates drug product manufacturersâ€™ risk assessment workflows and supplier qualification. The enhancements also help drug product manufacturers meet their own internal quality guidelines as well as those recently published by the European Commission. This was the first regulatory body to formalize risk assessment requirements for pharmaceutical excipients, despite the practice being common in industry.
